channel.title: Server like OLD OLD School Runescape?
channel.description: I mean when you could pick adventurer, wizard, whatever, and you can pk anywhere. Are there any servers that are set up like this? I've searched for awhile and haven't found anything. Perhaps it was attempted in the past and it didn't work out too well?

item.title: Server like OLD OLD School Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @BuyMyJunk BuyMyJunk
item.description:
@BuyMyJunk wrote:

[quote=“stich983, post:36, topic:232277”][quote author=BuyMyJunk link=topic=305969.msg2501844#msg2501844 date=1224714595]

BuyMyJunk: I can’t really agree on that adding features to reflect the old days is the same as actually using an older client. The server you showed a picture from, is obviously derived from RSCDaemon, which in ground was based off of version 202.

And I honestly doubt that anyone have ever made a server using a client older than version 135, which, as stated, Geminus used. I don’t even know if anyone have a client older than that to start with? Atleast I have never seen any around… Not even when I was at Kaitnieks.com.

you dont, and i aint sharing
[/quote]
well where can you download RSCdaemon at least???[/quote]
rscdaemon doesnt have this unless you added it
and use the search button

Read full topic

item.title: Server like OLD OLD School Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @BuyMyJunk BuyMyJunk
item.description:
@BuyMyJunk wrote:

[quote=“ephemeral, post:32, topic:232277”]BuyMyJunk: I can’t really agree on that adding features to reflect the old days is the same as actually using an older client. The server you showed a picture from, is obviously derived from RSCDaemon, which in ground was based off of version 202.

And I honestly doubt that anyone have ever made a server using a client older than version 135, which, as stated, Geminus used. I don’t even know if anyone have a client older than that to start with? Atleast I have never seen any around… Not even when I was at Kaitnieks.com.[/quote]
i didnt mean making a server using the old client, i ment just adding that old feature into a 202 client for rscd, or demonik
and server
i just always like that you could select a class like that so i figured i would add it into a server im slowing making

i have 106, and 127 the oldest 2 i have
i took it right from the 106 client and converted for the rscd client

in short just taking old feature and updating it

[quote=“Ian, post:33, topic:232277”]i just came across this on a runescape classic fact sheet

Part one: Choose a character class.

The classes you can choose from are:

• Warrior - Warriors start out with a bronze short sword and wooden shield. They also have 3 attack, defence, and strength. If you start out with this class, you will also start with 12 hitpoints.
• Wizard - Wizards start out with a staff and a blue wizards hat. Their stats are 1 attack, defence, and strength with 10 hitpoints. You will also start with +6 Goodmagic.
• Adventurer - Adventurers start out with 11 hitpoints with 1 attack, defence, and strength. When you start, you will also get a bronze axe(hatchet), jug, pot, and tinderbox.
• Necormancer - Rangers start with 10 hitpoints, a staff, and black wizards hat. They also have 1 attack, defense, and strength. • Ranger - Rangers start out with a shortbow and 10 arrows. They also have 12 hitpoints, 1 attack, defense, and strength level.[/quote]
thank you

[quote=“stich983, post:34, topic:232277”][quote author=BuyMyJunk link=topic=305969.msg2500629#msg2500629 date=1224633955]

Yea… Why has no one made a server like this yet?

whats to say it hasnt already been made but not released?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 21, 2008, 08:30:28 pm[/size][hr]

[/quote]where do you download that?[/quote]
you dont, and i aint sharing

Read full topic

i just came across this on a runescape classic fact sheet

Part one: Choose a character class.

The classes you can choose from are:

• Warrior - Warriors start out with a bronze short sword and wooden shield. They also have 3 attack, defence, and strength. If you start out with this class, you will also start with 12 hitpoints.
• Wizard - Wizards start out with a staff and a blue wizards hat. Their stats are 1 attack, defence, and strength with 10 hitpoints. You will also start with +6 Goodmagic.
• Adventurer - Adventurers start out with 11 hitpoints with 1 attack, defence, and strength. When you start, you will also get a bronze axe(hatchet), jug, pot, and tinderbox.
• Necormancer - Rangers start with 10 hitpoints, a staff, and black wizards hat. They also have 1 attack, defense, and strength. • Ranger - Rangers start out with a shortbow and 10 arrows. They also have 12 hitpoints, 1 attack, defense, and strength level.

But it is simple to make your own, just use something in the swing libs, set packets on the client to draw it, and send data to the server when selected. then draw it upon new account login.[/quote]Not simple to people that can’t code.

item.title: Server like OLD OLD School Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

the screen to choose all the classes is not in 204 clients, the code was removed by jagex i guess (to lower size (lol a few kb?) i assume, since they removed it from the game)

But it is simple to make your own, just use something in the swing libs, set packets on the client to draw it, and send data to the server when selected. then draw it upon new account login.

Read full topic

item.title: Server like OLD OLD School Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @Godandjesus Godandjesus
item.description:
@Godandjesus wrote:

HERE ARE RSC CLASSES:
  • Necromancer (Eventually became Wizard. This focused on Magic, since Necromancy was the original Magic) - Started out with a black wizard hat and a regular staff.
    • Warrior (melee combat skills) - Started out with a bronze short sword and wooden shield.
    • Miner (mining) - Started out with a pick-axe, which at that time was the only type available. These were later turned into bronze pickaxes.
    • Adventurer (well rounded) - Started out with a bronze axe, tinderbox, and one piece of cooked meat.
    • Ranger (ranged) - Started out with a shortbow and arrows. Later arrows were different types-- (bronze-rune)

Read full topic
item.source: Server like OLD OLD School Runescape?
